snippet.title: Salmon Run for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

In Salmon Run you play as the salmon Sam, who has to swim up a river to get to his mate.

However, there are many different hazards. Such hazards include waterfalls (which Sam has to jump up), the black bear Bertha and her distant cousin, the ice bear Bert, seagulls, and fishermen.


What I think:

I really like weird and unique games, and this game is certainly both. However, more important for me is the gameplay...and quite honestly the gameplay doesn't disappoint.

Sure, the game is rather repetitive and somewhat buggy at times, but here I don't mind it so much.
